bos saha shenkal menewiya 1942 wasarehidi wiwaha wu bawata anekuth charithapadana kathruwaru liya dakwa athi athara, krishna bos wisin wasara 1941 wyangayen dakwima nisa dinaya pilibanda saka sahitha bawak athiweyi. 1937 di yuwala samaga bad gayitayin hi keti kalak sitiyawuda, yuddhaya atharathura owun samaga barlinayehi bosge dewana-ana-dena-niladhari lesin siti ee.si.en.nambiyar wethin aruma puduma saha wadath wyakula pilithura labini.

bombe tokis nishpadanayak wana eya gayan mukharji ge adhyakshanayaki.raj kamal kala mandir nishpadanaya karana lada mulma chithrapataya sakunthala thira gatha weyi.indiyanu wartha chithrapata anshaya arambaayi.indiyanu aarakshaka panatha yatathe indiyawe siyalu chithrapata bedaharinnan me sadaha owunge siyalu chithrapata walin mudalak gewiya yuthu wiya.ke.ramnath dakunu indiyanu chithrapata karmika shilpinge sangamaya arambaayi.wadiya muwiton wenuwen madhu bos nirmanaya kala raj nartaki chithrapataya kot dansar namin debas kawimen pasu amerikawe sinamahal kihipayaka thiragatha weyi.1944yuddhaya nisa indiyanu sinama nalu niliyange saha karmika shilpinge gewim mudal adu weyi.sewa pahasukam sapayima hingawima matha boho swadhina nishpadakawarunta chithragara pahasukam laba gatha nohaki weyi.mayisuraye mulma chithragaraya nawa jothi arambaayi.rajaya magin chithrapata upadeshaka mandalayak path karayi.
